price: Na wakaja watu wa mji ule nao furahani.
footnotes: Asubuhi kulipo pambazuka waliwaona Malaika kwa sura ya binaadamu wazuri. Wao wale wakawafurahia, wakaja ili wafanye nao vitendo vyao viovu, vya kuwaingilia wanaume.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
